title: language filter is not working properly
body: In my language words like "assim" "diz" "rapariga" and many others are restricted, language filter should not only be in english because makes everyone who doesnt speak english untick the language tick box, even kids will untick this.. i cant speak 3 lines without being restricted, i saw other people complain about this too https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/NJ7a06YY-regular-words-being-blocked-by-language-filter

replies.body: I'm guessing those particular words are censored due to containing words that *would* be more inappropriate. While they might be okay words in other languages, the NA server is based primarily on English.
i meant to post this on euw, the words are restricted there too
